name: Kheti Bazaar
description: KhetiBazzar is an agriculture e-commerce website that provides a platform for farmers and consumers to connect and trade products. The website is intended to make it easier to trade for agricultural goods and associated services, like delivery and payment. KhetiBazzar provides a simple and user-friendly interface for consumers to browse and search for a variety of products by categories such as crops, livestock, transport and storage facilities. It also features a rating and review system to help users make informed decisions when purchasing products. Additionally, we offer a messaging system that enables farmers and buyers to communicate and negotiate prices and delivery options. Our website's payment system is secure and supports various payment methods, including credit cards, bank transfers, and mobile payments. KhetiBazzar aims to streamline the process of buying and selling agricultural products, enabling farmers to reach a broader market and consumers to access a wider range of products.
